title: Extension
description:
This control renders a custom control extension.

All Common Control Properties are supported.

Class.description: The name of the exported class in the module control that is to be used for the extension. On iOS, if no TS module is implemented, the native extension class targeted by this property must be declared as `public` to ensure proper lifecycle management.

Control.description: The name of the file under the `controls` folder in your module. e.g. `MyExtension`, if your file name is `/extensions/<Module>/controls/MyExtension.ts`. If not specified, module name would be used as the value for this property.

DataSubscriptions.description: Array of data change events to subscribe to.

ExtensionProperties.description: Additional custom properties to be passed to the extension

Module.description: The module's folder path under `/extensions/`, e.g. `MyExtModule` or `MyExtLibrary/MyExtModule`. On iOS, this property is optional, as the platform supports omitting TS code under `/extensions/<Module>/controls`.

OnPress.description: Action/Rule to be triggered when the control extension is pressed.
